block-editor-tutorial.title: Guide editor tutorial
block-editor-tutorial.description: Learn how to use the guide editor to create and edit interactive guides.

e2e-framework-test.title: E2E framework test
e2e-framework-test.description: Test fixture for the E2E framework. Not intended for end users.

first-dashboard.title: Create your first dashboard
first-dashboard.description: Learn to create a dashboard in Grafana. Covering features such as Explore, dashboard creation, visualizations and more.

first-dashboard-cloud.title: Create your first dashboard in Grafana Cloud
first-dashboard-cloud.description: Learn to create a dashboard in Grafana Cloud. Covering features such as Explore, dashboard creation, visualizations and more.

json-guide-demo.title: JSON Guide Demo - All Block Types
json-guide-demo.description: Demonstrates all available block types in the JSON guide format.

loki-grafana-101.title: Loki & Grafana 101
loki-grafana-101.description: Continue from the Prometheus tutorial: configure Loki and add a logs panel to your existing dashboard.

prometheus-advanced-queries.title: Advanced Prometheus Queries
prometheus-advanced-queries.description: Master advanced PromQL patterns including aggregations, histograms, predictions, and SLO calculations. Queries can be customized with Assistant for your datasources.

prometheus-grafana-101.title: Prometheus & Grafana 101
prometheus-grafana-101.description: Learn to use Prometheus and Grafana to monitor your infrastructure. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

welcome-to-grafana.title: Welcome to Grafana
welcome-to-grafana.description: Take a guided tour of Grafana's key areas. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.

welcome-to-grafana-cloud.title: Welcome to Grafana Cloud
welcome-to-grafana-cloud.description: Take a guided tour of Grafana Cloud's key areas. Perfect for getting started and understanding where everything is located.
